TopicTitle: World doesn't load when launching from SPH w/ B9 parts

Articles.Content:
KSP: 0.25 Windows 32-bit

Problem: World doesn't load when launching from SPH, can't move camera, only option is to revert to hanger or quit.

Mods installed:

E.V.E. 7.4

Texture Replacer 2.0.2.

Planetshine 0.2.2

Astronomer's Visual Pack - Interstellar V2

Chatterer 0.7.1

Deadly Reentry 6.2.1

Ferram Aerospace Research 0.14.4

Fine Print 0.59

B9 Aerospace Pack 5.2.6

KW Rocketry 2.6d

Kethane 0.9.2

MechJex2 2.4.0.0

Station Science 1.3.1

Kerbal Attachment System 0.4.9

Infernal Robotics 0.19.2

Module Manager 2.5.3

Reproduction steps: Use any B9 part (in the SPH, VAB is fine), launch it, the world seems to be missing but the atmosphere is showing (looks like a giant sphere from inside). I'm able to launch non-B9 spaceplanes just fine. B9 Vehicles can still be launched from the VAB. When I go back to the hanger after the error, the entire vehicle is missing except the cockpit. Snapping sounds also revert to default volume (I usually keep it at 5% volume so the change back to default is very noticeable). Restarting the game doesn't help.

Log: https://mega.co.nz/#!DcNmyCpR!uETow-0DzYLa-Aw6HXTSF4yJCeUJduuLwLf2C0AEPU8

I'm having this same problem in .90 (edit) reread, I cant even launch from the SPH.. so different problem.(end edit).. The mods we have in common are:

Texture Replacer

Ferram Aerospace Research

Kerbal Attachment System

Station Science

Infernal Robotics

Module Manager

Im guessing it's one of these.

Edited December 19, 2014 by Talavar
Same here. I have Station Science and Module Manager. Took out Station Science and still have the issue.
